description: Update a job production plan subscription

flags.name: --contact-method
flags.validation: One of: email_address, mobile_number. Example: mobile_number.

permissions: Admins can update. Non-admins can update if they are practically a member of the job customer or if the subscription belongs to them.
side_effects: Updates fields on an existing job production plan subscription.
validation_notes: <id> argument is required. At least one attribute must be provided; otherwise the command fails. Only contact-method is updatable (job-production-plan and user are not updatable). contact-method must be one of email_address or mobile_number when provided.
